short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect Article And Read it Later
short.zh_CN: 保存文章，稍后再读，支持导出，支持AI摘要、起标题、判断广告

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the power of AI in your web browsing experience with the AI-Enhanced Web Archiver. This browser extension revolutionizes the way you interact with online content, offering a suite of features designed to streamline your internet research and browsing activities.

Key Features:

Web Page Bookmarking: Save your favorite web pages with a single click. Never lose track of interesting content again.

Markdown Export: Convert your saved web pages into Markdown format, perfect for sharing, note-taking, or further processing.

AI-Enhanced Capabilities: Harness the power of AI to enhance your browsing experience.

Title Generation: Generate new, concise, and informative titles for your saved web pages.
Content Summarization: Get a quick summary of the content without having to read the entire page.
Ad Detection: AI-powered analysis to identify and highlight advertising content.
With the AI-Enhanced Web Archiver, you can make the most of your time online. Start browsing smarter today!
